sqlMap.select: SELECT BNR_ID, BNR_FILE_ID, BNR_SJ, NTCE_SDT, NTCE_EDT, USE_AT, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT, '%Y.%m.%d') AS REG_DT, LINK_URL, POP_YN, BNR_CN, POP_WIDTH, POP_HEIGHT, ORD_NO FROM TBL_BANNER ORDER BY CASE USE_AT WHEN 'Y' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END ASC , ORD_NO DESC , BNR_ID ASC LIMIT #recordCountPerPage# OFFSET #firstIndex#

SELECT BNR_ID, BNR_FILE_ID, BNR_SJ, NTCE_SDT, NTCE_EDT, USE_AT, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT, '%Y.%m.%d') AS REG_DT, LINK_URL, POP_YN, BNR_CN, POP_WIDTH, POP_HEIGHT, ORD_NO FROM TBL_BANNER WHERE USE_AT = 'Y' AND NTCE_SDT <= DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d') AND NTCE_EDT >= DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d') ORDER BY ORD_NO DESC, BNR_ID ASC LIMIT #recordCountPerPage# OFFSET #firstIndex#
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BANNER WHERE USE_AT = 'Y' AND NTCE_SDT <= DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d') AND NTCE_EDT >= DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d')
SELECT BNR_ID, BNR_FILE_ID, BNR_SJ, NTCE_SDT, NTCE_EDT, USE_AT, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT, '%Y.%m.%d') AS REG_DT, LINK_URL, POP_YN, BNR_CN, POP_WIDTH, POP_HEIGHT FROM TBL_BANNER WHERE BNR_ID = #bnrId#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_BANNER ( BNR_ID, BNR_FILE_ID, BNR_SJ, NTCE_SDT, NTCE_EDT, USE_AT, REG_DT, LINK_URL, POP_YN, BNR_CN, POP_WIDTH, POP_HEIGHT ) VALUES ( #bnrId#, #bnrFileId#, #bnrSj#, #ntceSdt#, #ntceEdt#, 'Y', SYSDATE(), #linkUrl#, #popYn#, #bnrCn#, #popWidth#, #popHeight# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TBL_BANNER SET BNR_SJ = #bnrSj#, NTCE_SDT = #ntceSdt#, NTCE_EDT = #ntceEdt#, USE_AT = #useAt#, LINK_URL = #linkUrl#, POP_YN = #popYn#, BNR_CN = #bnrCn#, POP_WIDTH = #popWidth#, POP_HEIGHT = #popHeight# WHERE BNR_ID = #bnrId#
UPDATE TBL_BANNER SET ORD_NO = #ordNo# WHERE BNR_ID = #bnrId#
